name: get_airtable_records
description: get list of data from airtable

base_id.description: base_id of the airtable url, normally the first id from the url, e.g. in this url below, the base_id is 'appj0J4gFpvLrQWjI', https://airtable.com/appj0J4gFpvLrQWjI/tblF40nG6wrdqwwd/viwmaFSAEFfe45wd?blocks=hide

table_id.description: table_id of the airtable url, normally the second id from the url, e.g. in this url below, the table_id is 'tblF40nG6wrdqwwd', https://airtable.com/appj0J4gFpvLrQWjI/tblF40nG6wrdqwwd/viwmaFSAEFfe45wd?blocks=hide
